1.title: I Need a Break

11.content:
One day Michael gets a txt around lunch time from his ex-girlfriend Lilli.

“Hey I know things didn’t so well between us but would you like to get lunch and talk about it, I’m buying” she says

At first he doesn’t know what to say first off she was pretty crazy toward the end of their relationship but the message seemed civil enough and it was a free meal. So he gets dressed and heads downtown to one of their favorite places.

When he gets there he gets a table and begins looking over the menu, moments later he gets a txt saying,

“I’m here.”

He then looks up to see her walking in the door with a big smile on her face, but he cant help but notice that she has ah… put on a little weight here and there…

He then tries not to look surprised as he gets up to give her a hug.

“Hey, ah it’s good to see you.” He says

“Yeah good to see you too, you haven’t changed a bit.” She says, “Ah thanks, ah neither have you…” he says

They sit down and begin talking, you know the usual small talk stuff, and then the waitress comes to take their order. Michael orders a burger with fries while Lilli orders a salad. Which he thought was weird because he had never seen her eat a salad before.

After the waitress leaves the conversation shifts to the salad.

“Wow I never thought I’d see you eat a salad.” He says jokingly, “Yea me neither, but as im sure you’ve noticed I could stand to lose a few pounds.” She says with a sigh looking down

“Ah no you don’t you look great to me.” He says trying not to look directly into her eyes

“Oh come on you have been looking at me funny ever since I walked in.” she says, “Ah yea because I haven’t seen you in a while…” he says, “Don’t even try that Mike, and this is all your fault!” she exclaims quietly as to not draw attention from other tables, “When we broke up I was in my apartment for a month eating ice cream, and since I wasn’t working out like normal this happened!” she said gesturing down to her belly, hips, thighs and butt.

“Wow hey I’m sorry.” He says, “No, I’m sorry,” she says taking a deep breath, “It’s just frustrating because I can’t eat what I want anymore and no matter how hard I try the weight just won’t go away.”

“Oh wow, don’t worry you’ll get there.” he says, “Yea I know, but the reason I came is to give you this.” she says handing him a small box out of her purse.

“What is it?” he asks, “Nothing much, I just saw it and thought of you.” She says

As he open the box there is a blinding flash of light and when it clears he is sitting across from an unfamiliar guy smiling at him. He then notices that the seat feels softer and cushier then before, he then looks down to see that is because of his larger thighs and butt! He then turns to the window to see his reflection, he is now a woman!
11.title: Michael and Lilli wants to lose weight but does...

111.content:
“Oh wow now that is what I call taking a load off.” The guy across from him says while stretching

“Who the Hell are you? And what did you do to me?!” Michael demands

“Hey calm down, you’re causing a scene.” He says, “I think I have a right to cause a scene, look at me!” Michael exclaims

“Oh yea baby got back,” he says laughing, “Wow hey, you seriously haven’t put two and two together.” He says giving him a moment to settle down.

“It’s me, Lilli, or should I say…” he says taking out his wallet, “Logan, nice but yeah that little box let us trade places.” He says

“Wait you’re not me, and I don’t know what I am so how is this trading places?” Michael asks

“Well it’s confusing and complicated; it is very rare and very powerful reality altering magic. You see within that flash of light we traded pretty much everything about us, and reality changed so everyone thinks this is how it’s always been. But you will figure all that out later the important thing is it is a temporary situation based swap, in our world breaking up with you made me gain all that weight, but now in this world you are the one that turned to ice cream and microwave dinners after we broke up. So if you stick to YOUR diet and exercise you will lose the weight for me then we swap back.” He says as the waiter brings a burger and fries for him and a salad for Michael.

“Oh wow this looks great, I haven’t had a burger in weeks.” He says, “Wait what?” Michael says confused, “Yea in this world you ordered the salad, you’re on a diet remember.” He says

14.content:
A few more options:

Option 1) Stephanie Haverston is the Homecoming Queen / Cheer captain of the school, and every bit as pretty and popular as such people usually are. Mark van-Durn is in many ways her exact opposite, quiet, reserved, and more interested in books than girls. Stephanie, however, is in danger of failing both science and math, and she thinks that by trading with Mark until after graduation, he'll be able to pass her classes for her.

Option 2) Jessica Keller has been her husband Tom's trophy wife for years. As Jessica approaches her mid 30s, her husband has been pushing her to consider plastic surgery.... she's put on a few pounds, and he's always wanted her to consider a few other 'enhancements.' Jessica finally agrees to it.... but he has to live her life through the surgery, and until she's completely healed.

Option 3) Susan Douglas has been having a rough time of it. She's spent the past several years doggedly climbing the corporate ladder, and at last her dream job was in sight. Only two things were in her way... first, there was Alan Rand, who was competing for the same job. Second was Martin Ross, the Executive VP who was in charge of the job. He'd been dropping hints that she would have to sleep with him to beat Alan out, and she didn't want to do that. She wants to swap with Alan... if he can get her the job, then they will swap back, and he can at least have his life back.

Option 4) Vivian Lee is a hard working single mother of two school age children. Her boss, Aaron Hall is not only five years younger than her, but lives a playboy life style, dating frequently and moving from one beautiful woman to the next. He keeps telling Vivian that she should put herself out there more, and that her life would be less stressful with someone to share it with. She plans to swap with him until he can find a decent boyfriend for her.
14.title: More Options

She was really desperate and searching for other solutions…
If she only could be as intelligent as this Mark guy from her classes. OK he was a nerd and nobody really likes him, but Stephanie and the others had to admit that Mark’s knowledge about math and any kind of science was the best on whole school. Properly he will pass his exams with highest grades…

14111.content:
Across town Mark Van-Durn was just finishing his third homework assignment of the night. Time had escaped him and it was now extremely early in the following morning. He too was facing a dilemma. At 18 years old he felt as though he had accomplished nothing in life. Yes, he was extremely intelligent in Maths and the sciences but truthfully felt something was amiss in his life. The pursuit of his knowledge had led towards a lonely path. It was this reason that he had began to put on some weight and did not care for his own disheveled appearance.

Never to admit his feelings to others his thoughts kept returning to his jealousy of Stephanie Haverston the cheer captain and homecoming queen at school. She had everything in life that he was looking for; popularity, gorgeous looks and a killer body rather than being a loner nerd

"If only I could have a life like Stephanie's" he thought.

It was at this point he too witnessed the wishing star in the night's sky. He thought It was a peculiar sight as meteors were very rare. Though through tiredness he decided that it would be best to investigate alien conspiracy theories in the morning.

Thinking nothing more of it he slowly drifted to sleep for a fresh new day.

Waking up....

As the silver disk sped low over the neighborhood, Jake (not his real name) tightened his seat-belt and turned to the other florescent lime-colored reptilian and said, "This planet really has some crazy critters, dude."

"It's great to listen to their thoughts as we buzz them, bro."

"When do we get to use the conversion extraction flipperoo device? I want to see if it really works."

"You know the procedures. We have to monitor their thoughts until we find compatible neuro sequences. Otherwise, they'll go berserk like happened over on that yellow planet."

"You gotta admit that that was quite a lot of fun watching them try to figure out what happened. Denying they were who they were reconfigured into."

"And that's just it. We don't need to repeat that test. Are you picking up anything on the alpha or beta channels?"

"Got one pubescent female worried about passing her grades wishing she was smart like some guy geek in her class."

OK. That sounds promising if the other person meets the test subject criteria. What's the details? Can you hone in on the other person so we see what's on his mind?"

14131.content:
"Searching. ... Subject found. ..."

Mark was pushing a pencil across the paper with his eyes closed. He couldn't concentrate on his assignment. Well, actually it was the fifth extra-credit work. His assignments were all done - the calculus, the physics, the astronomy, the chemistry.

But his mind was wandering and wondering. Not about any subject, but a subject in one of his classes a particular, attractive, popular girl.

I wish I wasn't such a nerd. I wish I could be popular and do sports, be a leader like she is. I wonder what it would be like to have all that attention and be pursued by all the guys instead of being such an invisible nerd.

It was then that a rush of wind and a rumble shook Mark's house rousing him from his thoughts.

Strange, Mark thought as he began to feel tingly all over. This time it was a much different feeling than the usual brought on by his thoughts of Stephanie.
14131.title: The mind of Mark

choices: She confronts him over dinner, and delivers an ultimatum

142.content:
Jessica had finally reached the point where she'd had enough. Enough of Tom's nagging, enough worrying that he was banging secretaries and floozies on his 'business trips.' Enough worrying that she'd find herself and her son out on the streets with a freshly signed divorce decree and a prenup that she wished she'd never signed shoved in her face.

Twelve years ago, when she'd been twenty two and foolish, she'd though Tom was the greatest catch in the world. Sure, he was ten years older than her, but that only made him seem like so much better of a catch than the losers she'd been dating. He'd been strong, confident, independent and already wealthy. He'd taken her to nice restaurants, bought her nice things to wear, took her on fancy trips, and he always told her how beautiful she was. When he asked her to marry him, less than a year after they met, she'd been too over the moon to worry about the minor legal details that 'his lawyer insisted on.'

But then, slowly, things had changed. Oh the first five years had been wonderful, and he'd said that he was in no hurry to have children. She'd been slim, athletic with perky B-cup breasts and a figure that came from a love of active hobbies. He'd delighted in showing her off, taking her on cruises where she soaked up the sun until she developed a pleasant bronzed tan that complimented her naturally wavy dark hair. He'd reveled in taking her dancing, where she could show off her long legs and 5'9" figure as they strode across the floor. Those had been enchanted days.

But then, he'd started to feel his age a bit, and the desire for a child to pass the family business on to was becoming stronger than the desire to have a trophy wife with a figure unspoiled by pregnancy. Even then, it had taken two years of trying, with business trips constantly at war with her own cycle and the best times to conceive. Finally, at twenty nine, they had conceived, and she gave birth to their son Hamish. That had been five years ago.

Since then, she'd felt more and more like a trophy mom than trophy wife. The pregnancy had been hard on her, and she'd spent too much time on bed rest, both before and after delivering. Then, during Hamish's first two years, she'd insisted in taking care of him directly, and refused Tom's offer to hire a nanny. Finally, she'd given in on that, and taken some of her own time back. But... the years had done their work, and she wasn't the stunning slim woman at thirty two that she was at twenty nine.

And that was when Tom started dropping hints. He had an old college buddy who was a surgeon, he'd say, who could set her up with one of those 'mommy makeovers' and help her get back on track. Jessica had refused. She'd begged off, saying she just needed to get back out to the tennis court, and work on her diet more. The taste she'd acquired while pregnant for things that were both deep fried and salty hadn't left her after Hamish was born, and that too had had an impact on her figure. The excuse worked for a time, but six months later, when she'd made little progress towards 'getting back into shape,' Tom started hinting again.

This time though, it was a little worse. He'd mention the 'mommy makeover,' and then he'd follow it up with a casual statement of something more. "You know, while he's at it, he could probably do a little work on your breasts.... fill them up a little more..." Or he'd make another comment: "Did you know they do permanent makeup now? I bet that'd save you some time in the mornings...."

For over a year this had gone on. Meanwhile, his business trips became more frequent, and when he came home, he seemed even less interested in sex. She couldn't prove he was having an affair, but even if he wasn't, how much longer would it be until he was? She had to do something. Finally, she'd found her answer. A magic that would let her put him in her shoes. She'd found her way out of the pickle, one way or another, things would get better.
142.title: Option 2) Jessica Keller

He saw a picture of his mom who was now a chubby boy with red hair named Cary.
Bernice laughed and said'This is awesome.No more school Mom has to go and I can drink.How about shots,Linda?"His voice sounded husky.
Meanwhile Cathy found herself in her son's room.She smelled marijuana.She had a video game controller in a pudgy hand with no nails.Ben's friend Chris was smoking a blunt!She was fat and she was wearing her son's clothes and sneakers.Her hair was gone.She felt giddy.'What's going on?"she asked in a strange deep voice.
"We just died,bro."Chris said.
152.title: 35 year old, single mom Cathy Jones and her laz...

choices: a lightnig strikes causing to swap bodies with Kelly
Kelly makes a wish to god today in church
Maria interacts from the other side...
153.content:
This will be story of father and daughter, Martin and Kelly.
Maria, Martin’s beloved wife and mother of Kelly died some years ago, while she suffering from cancer quite a long time…
Martin still can’t handle this and scope with being alone with a teenage daughter, sometimes not understanding her and her world, so he focused on his work as a bank manager. With a lot of work and some money from Maria’s life insurance there not any kind of misses in the material aspect, they had a good house, Kelly has an own car etc…
She is also quite popular around her school. She is having really good body and look and many boys are some kind of headhunting her or at least they have an eye on her.
It was Sunday and she was becoming religious after the dead of her mom, so she went to church nearly every Sunday, so also today.
This was important to her even most of other girls from school having a relaxing Sunday morning in their beds…
Kelly is almost 17 and still a virgin! Her mother told her to wait for mister right and keeping this promise she gave her mother on her last day on earth was very important to Kelly. Her dad was also happy, because so there were not much boys around, who could get her pregnant or breaking her heart….
But Martin overall did not understand girls and teenagers. He was over 40, almost 50, so his own youth was quite a time back…
Sometimes he wishes he could be young again, just hanging around, enjoying live etc….getting the feeling of true love like he felt with Maria again…

How does his wish will be fulfilled?
153.title: 45 year old Martin Collins and his 16 year old ...

1532.content:
It was typical on their Christian community to wear dresses for the girls and tuxedos for the males.
So like every Sunday morning Kelly dressed herself in one of her mother’s dresses, she got as a heritage or leftover. She loved this dress, because it was fashionable and her size, but the most important fact of course was that is belonged to her mother before. She bought it on a common shopping tour only a couple of days before she passed away. Kelly guesses that things like that her father will never ever understand, for sure since he has no clue about how to be a teenage girl….So today while being in church she made her wish to God that her Dad could understand better how to be a teenage girl…
The priest in today’s divine service spoke about balance of love, meaning you wish to get something from another person you also have to give and Jesus proposal was to give first and also give more then the other one would expect or need. Kelly thinks again about her wish and prayed again and added I also would like to know how it is to be him, a windowed and hardworking and a caring father…
1532.title: Kelly makes a wish to god today in church

15322.content:
Kelly again this Sunday morning left for Church. I before my beloved wife died was also an active member of the Christian community, but never went to church after the funeral.
While I was reading the Sunday news paper I saw Kelly like every Sunday morning dressed nicely for church in one of her mother’s dresses, she got as a heritage or leftover. She loved this dress, because it was fashionable and her size, but the most important fact of course was that is belonged to her mother before. She bought it on a common shopping tour only a couple of days before she passed away. Kelly guesses that I as man will never understand things like, but I understand it more then I like to…
For sure I must admit that sometimes I have no clue about how to raise a teenage girl….So also today like very often after my los, I made a wish to God, even I lost my believe somehow. My wish was that I could understand better how she feels and how it is to be a teenage girl…
15322.title: same time at home ---how is the Sunday for her Dad

info.brief_description: Two people trade age, gender, and lives in general for the ultimate mile in her shoes exp
info.description:
In this story we will be using either a fairly original TG concept or a far underutilized one, which will first require one of my long detailed explanations.

It all started when I was discussing ideas for a TG comic with an artist friend of mine on deviantART. I didn't want a standard body swap or transformation, though both of them are classics and the very foundation of TG. But we decided to combine both of them and take it a step farther, calling it a transformation swap.

For example take a guy and a girl. The guy is a 15 year old high school student and the girl is 22 year old college student. If the two of them were to transform swap then the guy would transform into the 22 year old female version of himself and the girl would turn into the 15 year old male version of herself. Not only that but as far as the rest of the world is concerned this is how things have always been and they pick up each other’s lives were they left off. If she had a tattoo, now he has one, if he has a part time job then they will be expecting the new her to show up for it. And just for fun let’s say the two of them are connected now, if she losses her job while they are swapped then he will not have it when they swap back, or if he gets his nose pierced as here then she will have it when they swap back.

Personally I love this idea and can’t believe it isn't being used more, and if it is I haven’t seen it so I’m going to be the first that I know of to bring this kind of swap to Writing.com.

I’m not going to worry about rules this time so just have fun with it, though I reserve the right to delete anything that I believe to be inappropriate or a pointless filler.

Enjoy :)
